labels.message: Everything OK.

This record can not be found.
The reservation is not unique. Check the date, destination, item and ticket number.
We did not find any departures with the information you provided. Check the date, destination and pickup point.
The password cannot be changed. Possibly, the current password id wrong.
The RefNo already exists. Please try again.
This record has already been updated by another user!
When the user is an admin, the connected client must have an 'asterisk'
When the user is not an admin, the connected client must be given
When the user is not an admin, the connected client must be given
It's not possible to add or change a reservation after the ship's departure.
The reservation cannot be saved because overbooking is prohibited.
New reservations with transfer while we are closed are not allowed. Please contact an administrator.
This record is in use and can't be deleted.
We are unable to continue. Please make sure that the username and/or the email don't belong to another user.
The approach order already exists.
Something went not so well, but it has been reported.
Authentication was not successful.
We've just sent you an email.
We can't send you an email right now, please try again in a little while.
Before you continue, all changes must be saved.
You have not selected any records.
There are no cameras on your device.
The new password cannot be saved. The link in the email you were sent may no longer be valid.

The option requires a higher level of authorisation.
RefNo
Everything OK.
Shall we delete this record?
Please confirm that you want to logout!
The password can be changed only by the owner of the account.
We have detected changes in the size of the calendar. Do you want us to update it with new data?
Your screen resolution is too low for the app to display correctly. You need at least 1280x800 pixels. Continue at your own risk!
Your reservation wasn't found.
You can contact the place where you made the reservation or one of us at +30 26610 71150 or +30 26620 61400.
Make sure that no passenger details are missing and that the reservation has been saved.
Make sure that no passenger details are missing, that you have provided the email and that the reservation has been saved.
The passenger registrars for this ship are not correct. For each ship there should be two active registrars, one of which should be declared as active.
